document.full_text: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial on charges he paid for sex with an underage prostitute and abused his power to cover it up should be moved to a special ministerial tribunal, his lawyers said on tuesday.
document.title: italy pm berlusconi's lawyers want sex trial moved
lines_and_colors: italian prime minister silvio berlusconi's trial on charges he paid for sex with an underage prostitute and abused his power to cover it up should be moved to a special ministerial tribunal, his lawyers said on tuesday.
